descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Kyle Lowry drains a deep 3-pointer to open up the game for the Heat.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Lowry drains a 3 from way downtown) 2021/10/31 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lowry drains a 3 from way downtown

videos.description: Ja Morant glides past the Heat defenders for the difficult 2-point shot.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Ja skips through the lane for a tough lay up) 2021/10/31 ESHEET

videos.headline: Ja skips through the lane for a tough lay up

videos.description: Jimmy Butler steals the ball from Ja Morant and coasts home for the easy dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Butler picks Ja’s pocket and coasts in for the dunk) 2021/10/31 ESHEET

videos.headline: Butler picks Ja's pocket and coasts in for the dunk

videos.description: Kyle Lowry steals the ball and finds a wide open Jimmy Butler who slams it home just before halftime.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Lowry outlets to Butler who slams it home just before half) 2021/10/31 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lowry outlets to Butler who slams it home just before half

videos.description: Killian Tillie denies the Heat of a highlight-worthy dunk with this two-hand block.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Killian Tillie comes up with a huge two-hand stuff) 2021/10/31 ESHEET

videos.headline: Killian Tillie comes up with a huge two-hand stuff

videos.description: Jimmy Butler's 27 points, 5 rebounds and 7 assists help the Heat grab a road win over the Grizzlies.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jimmy Butler highlights vs. Memphis Grizzlies) 2021/10/31 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jimmy Butler stuffs the stat sheet as Heat power past Grizzlies
